snippet.title: Everything Has Arms
snippet.description:
All hands on Deck, all arms on body! Everything Has Arms, the fast-paced VR hide-and-seek is out now. The game is available in Early Access on Steam and as Applab game on Oculus Quest. It comes with a social island, racing tracks and a prop-hunt game mode for four players. Check out the costumes and sleeves in the dressing room!

Some features:
- physics based movement
- social VR island
- creators tools
- racing mode
- prop-hunt / hide and seek for four players

Join the discord for feedback and bugreports!
